version_description:
- Bug fixes
- Stability fixes

Check more from in-game news!

- Bug fixes
- Stability fixes

Check more from in-game news!

GLOBAL LAUNCH UPDATE
The best and craziest hockey, now available worldwide! Join the action, beat your opponents and become the Champion!

We've made a few minor fixes and improvements to the game. Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and thanks for the continued support!

Read more from in-game news. Follow us on social media, send feedback and join the conversation!

We've made a few minor fixes and improvements to the game. Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and thanks for the continued support!

GLOBAL LAUNCH UPDATE
The best and craziest hockey, now available worldwide! Join the action, beat your opponents and become the Champion!

We've made a few minor fixes and improvements to the game. Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and thanks for the continued support!

Read more from in-game news. Follow us on social media, send feedback and join the conversation!

JUNE UPDATE IS HERE

We've made a few fixes and improvements to the tournaments, 2v2 events and to the game in general. Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and a big thank you for the continued support!

Read more from in-game news. Follow us on social media! Send feedback and join the conversation!

JUNE UPDATE IS HERE

We've made a few fixes and improvements to the tournaments, 2v2 events and to the game in general. Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and a big thank you for the continued support!

Read more from in-game news. Follow us on social media! Send feedback and join the conversation!

SEPTEMBER UPDATE IS HERE!

We're preparing for the autumn by doing some housekeeping, getting rid of cobwebs and sweeping away a few bugs that have crept in
Read more about it from in-game news!

Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and a big thank you for the continued support!
Follow us on social media, send your best moments to the Goal of the Month competition + join the conversation!

NOVEMBER UPDATE IS HERE!

NEW GAME MODE: 2v2 Friendly Matches! Play casually with a friend or random teammate! Win matches together and both get bigger rewards!
NEW RUMBLER : Spy Chameleon! This Rumbler infiltrates the opposing team and they will pass him the puck believing him to be their teammate. That is a mistake because Spy Chameleon will catch the ball, reveals his true colors and shoots at their goal!
NEW FEATURE: Multiple Special Events and New Event View! We added support to play multiple Special Events, Challenges and Tournament at the same time! More challenging events with bigger rewards incoming!

NOVEMBER UPDATE IS HERE!

NEW GAME MODE: 2v2 Friendly Matches! Play casually with a friend or random teammate! Win matches together and both get bigger rewards!
NEW RUMBLER : Spy Chameleon! This Rumbler infiltrates the opposing team and they will pass him the puck believing him to be their teammate. That is a mistake because Spy Chameleon will catch the ball, reveals his true colors and shoots at their goal!
NEW FEATURE: Multiple Special Events and New Event View! We added support to play multiple Special Events, Challenges and Tournament at the same time! More challenging events with bigger rewards incoming!

Holiday season is here and there's no better time to enjoy epic hockey than this!
- New acrobatic Rumbler!
- New Special Events!
- Bug and stability fixes

Hope you're enjoying Rumble Hockey and a big thank you for the continued support!
